name: Oshi (Lusófona Games: Arcade Room)
description:
Help Oshi in his quest!

Oshi is an adventure through a mysterious world. Paint with light and help Oshi, a luminescent creature, survive in the darkness. Use light to attract enemies and activate traps. Never play the same level twice!

Main Features
  • Use the light: OSHI is a 2D puzzle platformer for mobile that uses the light as a core mechanic.
  • A dark world: The game setting is dark, and the light appears in two ways in the game: the main character who is a luminescent being; the light that can be used to paint on the screen.
  • Challenging gameplay: find various challenges to overcome!
Controls

Oshi is compatible with most standard Android OS.
